sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.AppWidgetAssociationAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>AppWidgetAssociationAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var AppWidgetAssociationAjax = Class.create(); AppWidgetAssociationAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { WIDGET_ASSOCIATION_TABLE : 'sn_app_widget_association', ASSOCIATION_FIELD_NAME : 'association_id', getWidgetCount: function() { var gr = new GlideRecord(this.WIDGET_ASSOCIATION_TABLE); gr.addQuery(this.ASSOCIATION_FIELD_NAME,this.getParameter('sysparm_doc_id')); gr.query(); return gr.getRowCount(); } });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-03-13 06:47:15</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2aaabe13738033000b512b158bf6a749</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AppWidgetAssociationAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Widgets" source="com.snc.app.widgets">f92012ab47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4370</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2aaabe13738033000b512b158bf6a749</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-03-14 12:20:11</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
